objects.name: Analytic 0177
objects.description: Defenders may detect abuse of container administration commands by observing anomalous use of management utilities (`docker exec`, `kubectl exec`, or API calls to kubelet) correlated with unexpected process creation inside containers. Behavioral chains include unauthorized API requests followed by command execution within running pods or containers, often originating from unusual user accounts, automation scripts, or IP addresses outside the expected cluster management plane.
